Career Profile

Jake has been a musician since 5 years old, playing piano and violin. He got his start with audio engineering in high school, operating a mobile studio recording local bands and talent. For the past 10 years he has been collaborating with artists to write original songs, throw events, and DJ college parties and club events. After going back to school to finish his degree in music, he is now looking for opportunities in both music production and performance fields.

Experiences

Live Sound Technician

2015 - 2016
Still Listening Productions

Set up and soundchecked small and medium sound systems for DJs/Performers, as well as managing gear transitions during events. Responsible for tranporting gear to and from venue.

Live Sound Technician

2012 - 2015
UC San Diego Tech Services

Responsible for live mixing bands and DJs while operating front-of-house. Managed monitoring and stage transitions during events, including crew management for setup and strike shifts.

Assistant Engineer

2011
Jeff Trott (Producer for Sheryll Crow, Stevie Nicks)

Assistant engineer work for professional producer (Sheryl Crow, Stevie Nicks). Experience with editing/tuning vocal tracks, instrument sound design, and studio set-up
